channel.title: Justin Balsamo on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Justin Balsamo on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Justin Balsamo and Cari Sanders Launch New Awards Shingle Tenth House PR (Exclusive)
item.description: Balsamo and Sanders, who most recent worked at Amazon MGM Studios and The Angellotti Company, respectively, will focus on Oscar, Emmy, Golden Globe and major guild campaigns.
